entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over southwestern sections. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
